e(){for(var e=0,o={};e<arguments.length;e++){var t=arguments[e];for(var n in t)o[n]=t[n]}return o}function o(t){function n(o,i,r){var s;if(arguments.length>1){if(r=e({path:"/"},n.defaults,r),"number"==typeof r.expires){var a=new              <path d="m95.4 55.9c-4.8-1.5-6.9.4-8.3.5 1.5-1.7 1.2-4.7-.9-5-3.8-.6-2.7 3.5-1.8 5.4.6 1.2 1.3 3.2 3.2 3 2.3-.2 1.9-2 5.2-2.3 0 0 4.1.3 4 1.6-.2 1.9-2.3 2.6-3.7 3.1-2 .7-4.4-.3-6.1 1.6-.5.6-.9 1.4-.7 2.1.2.7.3.4 2.5.6-1.3 1.6-2 4-2 6-.1 5.6-1.5 10-.9 11.9 2.7-3.3 2.7-8.2 3.1-12.2.3-2.1 1-4.3 2-5.8 1.2-1.8 3.4-1.8 4.8-2.9 1.4-1 3.5-2.7 3.4-4.3-.3-2.1-2.2-2.7-3.8-3.3">

  <div class="page-wrapper" id="maincontent">
   <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid cover">
    <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
     <div class="vc_column-inner">
      <div class="wpb_wrapper">
       <div class="feature">
        <div class="wc-slider">
         <div class="wc-slide">
          <div class="brand-feature">
           <div class="container">
            <div class="row">
             <div class="col col-sm-12">
              <style>
               @media (max-width: 374px){
body .brand-feature h1 {
--font-calc-base:.5;
}
              </style>
              <h1>
               Together.
               <br/>
               We continue.
              </h1>
              <div class="brand-feature--button-group">
               <a class="brand-feature--btn" href="https://admissions.colostate.edu/academic-programs/">
                Academic Programs
               </a>
               <a class="brand-feature--btn" href="https://admissions.colostate.edu/applying-to-csu/">
                Apply Now
               </a>

                Support Rams

           </div>
          </div>
          <script>
           var output=''; if(!isMobile.any()){ output = output += "<div class='video-container'><video autoplay='true' loop='true' style='background:black' class='video-background' muted='true'><source src='https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-recode-2.mp4' type='video/mp4'></video></div>"; } else { output = output += "<div class='full-background' style='background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);' data-src-phone='https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-mobile-600x273.jpg'  data-src-tablet='https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-mobile-870x396.jpg' data-src='https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-mobile.jpg'></div>"; } document.write(output);
          </script>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid page-content">
    <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
     <div class="vc_column-inner">
      <div class="wpb_wrapper">
       <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid layer roots roots-top" id="roots">
        <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
         <div class="vc_column-inner">
          <div class="wpb_wrapper">
           <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element roots-content">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <p>
              The CSU community has been committed to improving lives and raising the human spirit for 150 years. We have faced many obstacles during that time, but perhaps none as extraordinary as COVID-19. Together, our efforts will continue and grow stronger as we support the world. Our infectious disease research is aiding in the fight against this pandemic and we have adapted to operate in new and innovative ways. Yet, as the world changes, our commitment to our students and their quality education remains the same.
             </p>
             <p>
              <a class="brand-feature--btn" href="https://admissions.colostate.edu/virtual-experiences-at-csu/">
               Virtual Experiences
              </a>
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="wpb_raw_code wpb_content_element wpb_raw_html">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <style>
              .loaded body .roots h2 {
    font-size: 3em;
}
@media (min-width: 1100px){
.loaded body .roots h2 {
    font-size: 4.5em;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}
}
             </style>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6">
         <div class="vc_column-inner">
          <div class="wpb_wrapper">
           <div class="image-stretch-right brand-feature--img-overlay__orange" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-video.jpg" data-src-desktop="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-video-1112x677.jpg" data-src-phone="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-video-600x365.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-video-870x530.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
           </div>
           <noscript>
            <div class="full-background" style="background-image:url(https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2020/04/together-video.jpg);">
            </div>
           </noscript>
           <div class="wpb_raw_code wpb_content_element wpb_raw_html">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <a class="popup-youtube btn btn-center btn-play feature-button" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jt4pcJNddmU">
              <i class="fa fa-play text-icon">
              </i>
              <span class="text-bottom">
               Watch
               <br/>
               "Together. We continue."
              </span>
             </a>
             <style>
              body a.feature-button .text-left, body a.feature-button .text-right {
    opacity: .8;
}
body a.feature-button .text-left, body a.feature-button .text-bottom {
    opacity: .8;
    display:block;
    margin-top:1.3rem;
    text-align:center;
    text-transform:initial;
}
             </style>
            </div>

       <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid layer about-layer">
        <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
         <div class="vc_column-inner">
          <div class="wpb_wrapper">
           <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <h2>
              About
              <br/>
              Colorado State
             </h2>
             <p>
              Colorado State University is one of the nations top public research universities and an institution on the rise. In the last decade, CSU has produced record enrollment, built on all-time highs in student diversity and student success; record fundraising far outpacing ambitious goals; groundbreaking research driven by a highly productive faculty; a campus revitalized by a transformational building campaign; and, perhaps most important, an unrivaled learning environment where nine of 10 recent graduates say they would choose CSU again and rate their education as excellent.
             </p>
             <div class="brand-feature--button-group">
              <a class="about-btn" href="https://admissions.colostate.edu/what-we-stand-for/">
               Our Culture
              </a>
              <a class="about-btn" href="https://diversity.colostate.edu/">
               Diversity and Inclusion
              </a>
              <a class="about-btn" href="https://admissions.colostate.edu/location/">
               Our Location
              </a>
              <br/>
              <a class="about-btn" href="https://about.colostate.edu/accolades">
               Accolades
              </a>
              <a class="about-btn" href="https://about.colostate.edu">
               More About Colorado State
              </a>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid layer choose" id="acad">

         <div class="vc_column-inner">
          <div class="wpb_wrapper">
           <div class="icon-box">
            <img alt="Research" src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/research.svg"/>
           </div>
           <div class="icon-content">
            <h4>
             Research
            </h4>
            <div class="page" title="Page 1">
             <div class="section">
              <div class="layoutArea">
               <div class="column">

                 Were pushing the world forward with inquiry and research that matters. Learn more about our research.
                </p>

             <a href="https://www.research.colostate.edu/">

       </div>
       <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid layer news-layer">
        <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
         <div class="vc_column-inner">
          <div class="wpb_wrapper">
           <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <h2>
              CSU NEWS
             </h2>
             <div class="homeblog">
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="wpb_raw_code wpb_content_element wpb_raw_html">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <script>
              function returnFeeds(feeds, maxItems){
  var arrayLength = feeds.length;
  var feedLoaded = [];
  var output = [];
  for (var i = 0; i < arrayLength; i++) {
      //alert(feeds[i]);
      //Do something
    feedLoaded[i] = false;
    console.log('feedloaded current: ' + i + ':' + feedLoaded);
    getFeed(feeds[i], i);
  }
  function getFeed(url, feed){
    $.getJSON(url, function(data){
       // console.log(data)
       for (var o=0; o<data.length; o++){
          var object = {}
          if(data[o].title){
            object = data[o]
            output.push(object);            
          }

        }
        feedLoaded[feed] = true;
        //console.log('feedloaded current: ' + i + ':' + feedLoaded);
        sortData();
    });
  }
  
  function sortData(){
    //console.log('status: ' + url1 +' | ' + url2);
    // console.log(output);
    if (feedLoaded.every(function(e){ return e === true })
    ) {
  // Here I'm building an article div with the title, excerpt and link to the live version.
      output.sort(function (a, b) {
        return a.date.localeCompare(b.date);
      });
      output.reverse();
      
      //console.log("l:" + output.length );

            var divBody = '';
            var count = 0;
            $.each(output, function(index) {
                if(output[index].title){
                    if(count < maxItems){
                        divBody += "<div class='articlewrapper' style='background-image:url("+output[index].featured_image.source_url+");'>";
                        // if (output[index].featured_image) {
                        //     divBody += "<img width='100px' src='" + output[index].featured_image.source_url + "' />";
                        // }
                        divBody += "<div class='article-content'>";
                    // divBody += "<p><span class='date'>" + output[index].date + "</span>";
                        divBody += "<p><a href='" + output[index].link + "'>" + "<span>" + output[index].title.rendered + "</span></a>";
                        // divBody += "<br /><span>" + output[index].excerpt.rendered + "<a href='" + output[index].link + "'>read more</span></a></p>";
                        divBody += "</div>";
                        divBody += "</div>";
    
                        count++;
                    }
                }
                
            });

            // Take our constructed div And put it into the above div
            $('.homeblog').html(divBody);
    } else {
      console.log('not loaded yet: ' + feedLoaded + ':');
    }

  }
}

//setting vars for the two feeds - this whole thing could likely be wrapped in a function that takes an array of feeds
//var url = 'https://warnercnr.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts';
// var url = 'https://source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?categories=2219&per_page=10';
var url = 'https://source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url2 = 'https://agsci.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url3 = 'https://biz.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url4 = 'https://chhs.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url5 = 'https://libarts.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url6 = 'https://natsci.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url7 = 'https://cvmbs.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url8 = 'https://engr.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';
var url9 = 'https://warnercnr.source.colostate.edu/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/?filter[taxonomy]=category&filter[term]=csu-main-curation&per_page=10';


//array of urls, and number of results
//returnFeeds([url, otherUrl,], 5);
returnFeeds([url, url2, url3, url4, url5, url6, url7, url8, url9], 5);
             </script>
             <p class="source-out">
              <a href="https://source.colostate.edu">
               more news from SOURCE
              </a>
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_inner vc_row-fluid layer social-footer">
        <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
         <div class="vc_column-inner">
          <div class="wpb_wrapper">
           <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <h3>
              Something is always happening at #ColoradoState.
             </h3>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="wpb_raw_code wpb_content_element wpb_raw_html">
            <div class="wpb_wrapper">
             <div class="inline socialicons">
              <ul>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.facebook.com/coloradostateuniversity">
                 <i class="fa fa-facebook">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  Facebook
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li style="display:none">
                <a href="https://plus.google.com/+ColoradoStateUniversity/posts">
                 <i class="fa fa-google-plus">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  Google Plus
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://twitter.com/coloradostateu">
                 <i class="fa fa-twitter">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  Twitter
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.youtube.com/ColoradoStateUniv">
                 <i class="fa fa-youtube">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  YouTube
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.instagram.com/coloradostateuniversity/">
                 <i class="fa fa-instagram">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  Instagram
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/coloradostateuniversity">
                 <i class="fa fa-flickr">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  Flickr
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/edu/school?id=17995">
                 <i class="fa fa-linkedin">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  LinkedIn
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
               <li>
                <a href="https://www.pinterest.com/coloradostateu/">
                 <i class="fa fa-pinterest">
                 </i>
                 <span class="sr-only">
                  Pinterest
                 </span>
                </a>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
             <!-- server available -->
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid">
    <div class="wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12">
     <div class="vc_column-inner">
      <div class="wpb_wrapper">
       <div class="wpb_raw_code wpb_content_element wpb_raw_html">
        <div class="wpb_wrapper">
         <!--<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://static.colostate.edu/fonts/industry/industry.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://static.colostate.edu/uncached/home-shim/css/style.css">-->
         <script>
          window.addEventListener('load', (event) => {
    console.log($('body'));

    //video link popop
    $('.popup-youtube, .popup-vimeo').magnificPopup({
      //delegate: 'a', // child items selector, by clicking on it popup will open
      type: 'iframe',
      // other options

      iframe: {
        markup: '<div class="mfp-iframe-scaler">'+
            '<div class="mfp-close"></div>'+
            '<iframe class="mfp-iframe" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>'+
            '</div>', // HTML markup of popup, `mfp-close` will be replaced by the close button

        patterns: {
            youtube: {
            index: 'youtube.com/', // String that detects type of video (in this case YouTube). Simply via url.indexOf(index).

            id: 'v=', // String that splits URL in a two parts, second part should be %id%
            // Or null - full URL will be returned
            // Or a function that should return %id%, for example:
            // id: function(url) { return 'parsed id'; }

            src: '//www.youtube.com/embed/%id%?autoplay=1&rel=0' // URL that will be set as a source for iframe.
            }
        }
    }
    });
});
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="footer layer sized">

     <div class="container">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col col-sm-4">

       <form action="https://www.colostate.edu/search/" id="searchform" method="GET" role="search">

         <div class="searchbox" style="font-size: 3.5em; line-height: 80px;">
          <input name="cx" type="hidden" value="001074770120494240330:nnxeddf6qe0"/>

          <input name="ie" type="hidden" value="UTF-8"/>

           Search:
          </label>
          <button form="searchform" type="submit" value="Submit">
           <i class="fa fa-search">

          </button>

       <!-- <form class="search-form" role="search" action="https://www.colostate.edu/search/" method="GET" id="search-form">
  <div class="searcharea">

      <div class="input-group">
        <input type="hidden" value="001074770120494240330:nnxeddf6qe0" name="cx">
        <input type="hidden" value="FORID:11" name="cof">
        <input type="hidden" value="UTF-8" name="ie">
        <label for="q">Search:</label>
        <input type="text" class="form-control" name="q" id="q" value="search:" onblur="if(value=='') value = 'search:'"
  onfocus="if(value=='search:') value = ''">
          <div class="input-group-btn">
              <button class="btn btn-default" type="submit" aria-label="Submit search"><span class="hide">Submit search</span><i class="fa fa-search"></i></button>

       <div class="azbar">
        <div class="azlist">
         <p>
          <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/search-csu-a-z-web-directory">
           CSU A-Z:
          </a>
         </p>
         <ul>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/a">
            A
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/b">
            B
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/c">
            C
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/d">
            D
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/e">
            E
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/f">
            F
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/g">
            G
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/h">
            H
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/i">
            I
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/j">
            J
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/k">
            K
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/l">
            L
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/m">
            M
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/n">
            N
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/o">
            O
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/p">
            P
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/q">
            Q

          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/r">
            R

          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/s">
            S
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/t">
            T
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/u">
            U

          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/v">
            V
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/w">
            W
           </a>
          </li>
          <li>
           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/x">
            X
           </a>

           <a href="https://www.colostate.edu/a-z/y">

              <div class="wpb_wrapper">

                 <div class="vc_column-inner">
                  <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <h3>
                      Prospective Students
                     </h3>

                       </a>
                      </li>

                        Campus Maps
                       </a>
                      </li>

                       </a>

                        Diversity

                        Get Information
                       </a>

                        Graduate School
                       </a>
                      </li>

                        Student Financial Services

                   <div class="wpb_text_column wpb_content_element qlFacstaff">
                    <div class="wpb_wrapper">
                     <h3>
                      Faculty &amp; Staff

  </div>
  <div class="offerpanel">
   <div class="college-info warner">
    <h3>
     Warner College of Natural Resources
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Answering challenges for the planet. The Colleges five departments focus on environment and sustainability, focusing on endangered species, tourism, and much more.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/06002_01497-870x581.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/06002_01497-600x400.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://warnercnr.colostate.edu/">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Warner College of Natural Resources:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info cvmbs">
    <h3>
     Veterinary Medicine &amp; Biomedical Sciences
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Investigating pressing questions of human, animal, and environmental health. The Colleges four departments focus on translational medicine and global public health.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/08022_00173-870x579.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/08022_00173-600x399.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="https://vetmedbiosci.colostate.edu">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Veterinary Medicine &amp; Biomedical Sciences:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info natsci">
    <h3>
     Natural Sciences
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Participants in the scientific process. The Colleges eight departments develop students as they become successful scientists and scholars who contribute to the world.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/07000_00301-870x579.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/07000_00301-600x399.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://www.natsci.colostate.edu/">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Natural Sciences:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info libarts">
    <h3>
     Liberal Arts
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Our students and faculty share a commitment to the well-being of the human community, the natural environment in which we live, and to the inspiration of the human spirit.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1104_CSU-129-870x580.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1104_CSU-129-600x400.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://libarts.colostate.edu">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Liberal Arts:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info hhs">
    <h3>
     Health and Human Sciences
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Advancing the state of living. The Colleges eight departments and schools take a scientific approach to improving the health and well-being of people, their environments, and communities.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1103_CSU-085-CROPPED-870x607.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1103_CSU-085-CROPPED-600x418.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://www.chhs.colostate.edu/">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Health and Human Sciences:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info engr">
    <h3>
     Walter Scott, Jr. College of Engineering
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Building the technologies that will change the future. The Colleges five departments address issues of human health, energy development, and global environment and water.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1103_CSU-368-870x580.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1103_CSU-368-600x400.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://www.engr.colostate.edu">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Walter Scott, Jr. College of Engineering:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info biz">
    <h3>
     Business
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      Looking toward the future of business. The Colleges five departments prepare students for enterprise in the modern global economy with an emphasis in sustainability and social responsibility.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1105_CSU-59-870x580.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1105_CSU-59-600x400.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://biz.colostate.edu">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Business:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="college-info agsci">
    <h3>
     Agricultural Sciences
    </h3>
    <div class="college-caption">
     <p>
      The land-grant tradition at our Universitys foundation. This Colleges five departments focus on the contemporary demands of agricultural production for a growing global population.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="college-image" data-src="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1105_CSU-342-870x580.jpg" data-src-tablet="https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/01/anna_jones_photography_1105_CSU-342-600x400.jpg" style="background-image:url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==);">
    </div>
    <p class="college-readmore">
     <a href="http://agsci.colostate.edu">
      <span class="hidden-alt">
       Agricultural Sciences:
      </span>
      Visit the College
      <i class="lnr lnr-arrow-right">
      </i>
     </a>
    </p>
    <div class="college-arrow">
     <a href="#">
      Close
      <i class="lnr lnr-cross">
      </i>
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>

   loadCSS("https://www.colostate.edu/wp-content/plugins/templatera/assets/css/front_style.css?ver=2.1", document.getElementById("non-critical"))
  </script>
  <noscript>

  function(){(b[l].q=b[l].q||[]).push(arguments)});b[l].l=+new Date;

  r.parentNode.insertBefore(e,r)}(window,document,'script','ga'));
